title: Recycling
creator_credit: Environmental Protection Agency and Stuart Finley
brief_description: Shows existing techniques for recovering materials from solid waste and describes the newly developed equipment and systems which may make recycling a universal project in the future. The pressure of public opinion in favour of recycling is enormous, nevertheless it is actually practised very little.
